thread.title: Kevin McCarthy's alleged congressional mistress responds to rumored affair
thread.title_full: Kevin McCarthy's alleged congressional mistress responds to rumored affair - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Kevin McCarthy's alleged congressional mistress responds to rumored affair
text: When Rep. Kevin McCarthy announced he was no longer running to become the next House Speaker, Washington was shocked and the Republican party was thrown into disarray. There were multiple reasons given for McCarthy's surprise exit, including allegations of infidelity. Photo by Alex Wong/Getty Images
